ygData.subject: RE: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope, heh.  These little pricks still find it in their heart to attack me anytime they see me.  You will never be high enough level for these twerps not to
ygData.messageBody:
> hoping at level 29 they won't aggro on me anymore, but not sure. I'm sure
> they don't aggro on level 30's. Too bad, seems like such a good place for
> exp and items at my level, but I can't make it to any of the good rooms. So
> you'll have to con everything and see if something is not indifferent to
> you. Anything not indifferent will jump you.

Nope, heh. These little pricks still find it in their heart to attack
me anytime they see me. You will never be high enough level for these
twerps not to attack, unfortunately.

Harmonic, the moltencloak, lavapendant, charredshield, charredgloves,
platarmband, foremantunic, koboldboot camping fool.

I've spent way too much time in this dungeon, but not nearly as
long as I have in permafrost then it becomes:

Harmonic, the mammothcloak, wolffurslipper, silverywaraxe, crystaline-
blade, wolfhidecloak, brassmask, runedcirclet cold camper.

...those ice goblins never learn either.
